# Home Security Intelligence

> AI-powered home security monitoring with real-time object detection and LLM-based risk analysis. Self-hosted, privacy-first.

## Quick Start

- [Quick Start Guide](llms-full.txt#tier-1-quick-start-no-ai): Run the stack in demo mode without GPU/AI services
- Clone, run `docker compose -f docker-compose.ghcr.yml up -d`, access at http://localhost:8080

## Full Deployment

- [Production Deployment](llms-full.txt#tier-2-production-deployment): Full stack with camera integration
- [Docker Compose (GHCR)](docker-compose.ghcr.yml): Pre-built container images from CI/CD
- [Deployment Docs](docs/DOCKER_DEPLOYMENT.md): Comprehensive deployment documentation
- [Runtime Config](docs/RUNTIME_CONFIG.md): All environment variables and configuration options

## AI Services

- [AI Setup Guide](llms-full.txt#tier-3-ai-services-setup): Configure GPU-based detection and analysis
- [RT-DETRv2](ai/rtdetr/): Object detection server (port 8090)
- [Nemotron](ai/nemotron/): Risk analysis LLM server (port 8091)

## Camera Setup

- [Camera Configuration](llms-full.txt#camera-configuration): Generic IP camera and Foscam FTP setup
- Cameras FTP images to `/export/foscam/{camera_name}/`

## Troubleshooting

- [Troubleshooting Guide](llms-full.txt#troubleshooting): Container, database, AI, and network issues
- [Health Check](llms-full.txt#verification): Verify all services are running correctly

## Architecture

- **Frontend**: React + TypeScript + Tailwind + Tremor
- **Backend**: Python FastAPI + PostgreSQL + Redis
- **AI**: RT-DETRv2 (detection) + Nemotron via llama.cpp (reasoning)
- **Containers**: Pre-built on GitHub Container Registry (GHCR)
